channel.title: Programming/Port Forwarding Help & Support
channel.description:
Welcome! You might remember me doing the Free coding Opportunities. Well, Since I've received the huge amount of emails and contact messages I've decided to create an Official Coding Email. So, I'm going to create a new thread containing new information.
Programming; If the server/Client is a big job then you'll be asked to upload the Server/Client to Uppit. You then will need to add a notepad inside the Server/Client folder containing all the jobs you'd wish to be completed. Once i receive the File I'll take a look and then tell you the estimated Price/Time. Once I complete the job I'll Message you with the URL. Please note; I've been attacked too many times using Msn file transfer.
Hosting - Port Forwarding Help/Support; I'll not be HOSTING any Server what's so ever. I'll guide you through the stages of Port Forwarding. Again, the price and time will pend on your router and connection/System.
The Requirements you should meet. Team-Viewer. Good Connection. Skype/Windows Live Messenger. Server/Client. The Internet. Access to your routers information. Access to Uppit. A forums. And you must actually use the server at some time of your life.
The Cost; I'll accept Rep+ RuneScape Account's. Forum Admin Server Co IncrediBot Users/ Membership RuneScape Pins
Contact Information
MediCoder@live.com - Mostly always online.
If you'd like the Coding opportunity's then leave this in the big wight box whilst adding. -Coding Opportunity's-
If you'd like the Hosting Support then leave this in the big wight box whilst adding. -Hosting Support-
